member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.RichText.Rtf.RtfSerializer.WriteText(System.String,System.Int32@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Writes the specified text to the RTF file.
member.param: The text to be written.
The start index of the text to be written.
Indicates whether characters should be written out even if their format type does not match the current type active in the document. Should be true for anything other than text content in a run.
member.returns: True if all text specified was written; False if one or more characters could not have been written.

member.summary: Returns the name of the first element if it is a tag, null otherwise.

member.summary: Determines whether the first element is a '\*' tag.

member.summary: Searches for the first child group which has a tag with the given name as its first child, e.g. the given destination.
member.param: the name of the start tag of the group to search
member.returns: the first matching group or null if nothing found
member.exception: in case of a null argument

member.name: P:Itenso.Rtf.IRtfParser.IgnoreContentAfterRootGroup
member.summary: Determines whether to ignore all content after the root group ends. Set this to true when parsing content from streams which contain other data after the RTF or if the writer of the RTF is known to terminate the actual RTF content with a null byte (as some popular sources such as WordPad are known to behave).

member.name: M:Itenso.Rtf.IRtfParser.AddParserListener(Itenso.Rtf.IRtfParserListener)
member.summary: Adds a listener that will get notified along the parsing process.
member.param: the listener to add
member.exception: in case of a null argument

member.name: M:Itenso.Rtf.IRtfParser.RemoveParserListener(Itenso.Rtf.IRtfParserListener)
member.summary: Removes a listener from this instance.
member.param: the listener to remove
member.exception: in case of a null argument

member.summary: Parses the given RTF text that is read from the given source.

member.exception: in case of invalid RTF syntax
in case of an IO error
in case of a null argument

member.summary: Called if parsing failed.

member.name: M:Itenso.Rtf.IRtfParserListener.ParseEnd
member.summary: Called after parsing finished. Always called, also in case of a failure.

member.name: T:Itenso.Sys.Collection.CollectionTool
member.summary: Some utility methods for collections.
member.remarks: Just a container for some static methods which make life somewhat easier.

member.name: M:Itenso.Sys.Collection.CollectionTool.ToString(System.Collections.IEnumerable,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: conventiently concatenates the given items to a string for debugging purposes.
member.remarks: the whole collection is embraced with square brackets and the individual items are separated by a comma. null items will be displayed as 'null' instead of the empty string.
member.param: the collection of items to print
the starting text
the ending textrint
the item delimiter text
text for undefined values
member.returns: a concatenation of the string representations of all the items
